text: Guotong Zhou is an engineer from the Georgia Institute of Technology in Atlanta, Georgia. She was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for her contributions to the analysis of nonlinear signals and systems. == References == == External links == * Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Georgia Tech faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:University of Virginia alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Guotong Zhou
